Body:
corpus, y = shap.datasets.imdb()
corpus_train, corpus_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(corpus, y,
    test_size=0.2, random_state=7)
vectorizer = TfidfVectorizer(min_df=10)
X_train = vectorizer.fit_transform(corpus_train)
X_test = vectorizer.transform(corpus_test)
model = sklearn.linear_model.LogisticRegression(penalty='l1', C=0.1, solver
    ='liblinear')
model.fit(X_train, y_train)
shapexplainer = LinearExplainer(model, X_train, feature_dependence=
    'independent')
shap_values = shapexplainer.explain_instance(X_test)
print('Invoked Shap LinearExplainer')
